mapper.select: SELECT id, account_type_name accountTypeName, account_type_no accountTypeNo FROM ms_account_type WHERE account_type_no IN ('CWTZ1','CWTZ2','CWTZ3')

SELECT m.id, m.account_type_name accountTypeName, m.account_type_no accountTypeNo, m.account_no_sequence accountNoSequence, m.allow_withdraw allowWithdraw, m.withdraw_poundage_scale withdrawPoundageScale, m.withdraw_poundage_min withdrawPoundageMin, m.withdraw_poundage_max withdrawPoundageMax, m.allow_refund allowRefund, m.refund_poundage_scale refundPoundageScale, m.refund_poundage_min refundPoundageMin, m.refund_poundage_max refundPoundageMax, m.withdraw_priority withdrawPriority, m.spend_priority spendPriority, m.create_date createDate, m.create_user createUser, m.update_date updateDate, m.update_user updateUser, m.remark FROM ms_account_type m WHERE 1=1
AND m.account_type_no = #{accountTypeNo}
